-- 1. Explicit project members for HIPs SELECT u.id, u.community_id, u.first_name AS firstName, u.last_name AS lastName, u.email, u.role, u.country, u.create_time AS createTime FROM user AS u INNER JOIN project_member AS pm ON u.id = pm.user_id WHERE pm.project_id = #{projectId}
UNION
-- 2. CIPs who have the same community as the project's community SELECT u.id, u.community_id, u.first_name AS firstName, u.last_name AS lastName, u.email, u.role, u.country, u.create_time AS createTime FROM user AS u INNER JOIN project AS p ON p.community_id = u.community_id WHERE p.id = #{projectId} AND u.role = 0
UNION
-- 3. CCPs who have the same country as the project's country SELECT u.id, u.community_id, u.first_name AS firstName, u.last_name AS lastName, u.email, u.role, u.country, u.create_time AS createTime FROM user AS u INNER JOIN community AS c ON c.country = u.country INNER JOIN project AS p ON p.community_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{projectId} AND u.role = 1
